Improvements.Improvement: Avoid repeatedly calling the same method
Improvements.Description: The `ArrayList.size()` method is called multiple times within the same scope. Instead of repeatedly calling this method, it can be stored in a variable and the variable can be used subsequently, which could enhance performance.

Improvements.Improvement: Avoid creating new objects inside a loop
Improvements.Description: The creation of new objects inside a loop can be inefficient. Instead, create the object outside the loop and reuse it inside the loop where necessary.
